channel.title: Star of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the star of the day.

item.title: Disney Star
item.description: Disney Star, registered as Star India Private Limited, was an Indian media conglomerate owned by Disney India. On 14 November 2024, it was merged with Viacom18 to form JioStar. It was the largest television and entertainment network in India, operating more than 100 TV channels and the Disney+ Hotstar streaming service.
